me anuwa 1977 di aprikanu ha aasiyanu ratawal atharin ek guwan widuli madhyawediyeku bagin thora ostreliyawedi pawathwana lada puhunu wadasatahana sandaha da lankawen theripathwuye prabha ranathungayanya. 1973 sita 1981 dakwama guwan widuli abhyasa aayathanaya thula katayuthu karamin hindi aya ee athara rupawahini puhunuwakda hadaramin 1981 di guwan widuliyen wishrama 77 aprikanu ha aasiyanu ratawala madhyawedi puhunuwa sadaha shri lankawa niyojanaya kala prathama madhyawediniya.

kurunagala pradhana wari paddhathi aluthwadiya kirima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 258 k wenkala athara me wana wita idikirim katayuthu sandaha rupiyal miliyana 164 k gewa awasan kara atha.palukadawala wawa, atharagalla wawa, ambaakolawawa, mahananneriya, odanakatiya, magalla, hulugalla waw da moragoda amuna da mema waw amunuwala pradhana wari paddhathi da prathisanskaranaya kirime katayuthu arambaa atha.gowinta waga katayuthu sandaha naya labadima, badairingu, kurakkan, thala, meneri, mun, kawpi waga sandaha da wi wagawata da, elawalu, pol, palathuru wagawata da kiri harak ha kukulu palanayata da wari pubuduwa wyapruthiyen mana sahayak laba di atha.dehi, dodam, delum, palathuru waga wyapruthi da arambaa atha.miridiya dhiwara karmanthayata athuru aadayam margayak washayen gowin yomu kirima udesa me wana wita wari pubuduwa magin mathsya patawun laksha gananak mudahara atha.ihala aswannak laba dena biththara wi nishpadanaya sandaha gowin wisidenakuge kandayam 237 k yomu kota athi athara ee sandaha gowin 5740 k srujuwa dayaka wi sitithi.gowiya nipadawana wi gowi gedaradima sahal bawata path kara ihala milakata rajya ha paudgalika ansha wetha alewi kirime itha sarthaka wyapruthiyak da “wari pubuduwa“ magin handunwa di atha.
